atk-abh03a34:2_3: pahīnakilesassa ca atītāpi kilesā pahīnāva honti,
atk-abh03a34:2_13: Natthi kilese jahatīti imasmiṁ pana paravādissa pañhe yasmā kacavaraṁ pajahantassa kacavare chaḍḍanavāyāmo
atk-abh03a34:2_14: viya kilese pajahantassa na atītādibhedesu kilesesu vāyāmo atthi,
atk-abh03a34:2_15: nibbānārammaṇe pana ariyamagge pavattite kilesā anuppannāyeva nuppajjantīti pahīnā nāma honti,
atk-abh03a34:2_17: Tena hi atīte kilese pajahatītiādi pana yasmā “natthi kilesapajahanā”ti na vattabbaṁ,
atk-abh03a34:5_2: Tattha suññatāti dve suññatā khandhānañca anattalakkhaṇaṁ nibbānañca.
atk-abh03a34:5_3: Tesu anattalakkhaṇaṁ tāva ekaccaṁ ekena pariyāyena siyā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṁ, nibbānaṁ,
atk-abh03a34:5_5: Imaṁ pana vibhāgaṁ aggahetvā “suññatā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a34:5_13: Yassa hi avibhajitvā “ekadeseneva suññatā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a34:5_17: Saṅkhārakkhandho na aniccotiādi nibbānasaṅkhātāya suññatāya aniccabhāvāpattidosadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a34:6_2: Saṅkhārakkhandhassa suññatā na vattabbātiādi “yadi saṅkhārakkhandhasuññatā sesakkhandhapariyāpannā na hoti,
atk-abh03a34:6_3: sesakkhandhasuññatāpi saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā na hotī”ti paṭilomadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a34:7_3: Tattha saṅkhārāti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti āgataṭṭhāne viya pañcakkhandhā,
atk-abh03a34:7_4: te ca attattaniyasuññattā suññatāti sāsanāvacaraṁ hoti,
atk-abh03a34:7_7: Yasmā panetaṁ na suññatāya saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannabhāvaṁ dīpeti,
atk-abh03a34:10_2: Tattha maggavīthiyampi phalasamāpattivīthiyampi ariyamaggassa vipākacittaṁ sāmaññaphalaṁ nāmāti sakasamaye sanniṭṭhānaṁ.
atk-abh03a34:10_3: Yesaṁ pana tathā aggahetvā “kilesapahānañceva phaluppatti ca sāmaññaphalaṁ,
atk-abh03a34:10_8: Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayattā yathā pāḷimeva niyyātīti.
atk-abh03a34:13_9: Na vattabbantiādi yāya laddhiyā patti asaṅkhatāti maññati,
atk-abh03a34:13_11: Tattha sakavādī “na hevaṁ vattabbe”ti paṭikkhipanto kevalaṁ pattiyā rūpādibhāvaṁ na sampaṭicchati.
atk-abh03a34:13_12: Na hi patti nāma koci dhammo atthi,
atk-abh03a34:13_14: Itaro pana paṭikkhepamatteneva asaṅkhatāti laddhiṁ patiṭṭhapeti,
atk-abh03a34:16_2: Tattha yesaṁ “rūpādīnaṁ sabbadhammānaṁ rūpādisabhāvatāsaṅkhātā tathatā nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a34:16_3: sā ca saṅkhatesu rūpādīsu apariyāpannattā asaṅkhatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a34:19_4: Ayaṁ nayo ṭhapetvā akusalaṁ sabbadhamme bhajati.
atk-abh03a34:19_5: Iṭṭhavipākaṁ nāma āyatiṁ upapattipavattesu iṭṭhaphalanipphādakaṁ puññaṁ.
atk-abh03a34:19_7: Yesaṁ pana imaṁ vibhāgaṁ aggahetvā anavajjabhāvamatteneva nibbānaṁ kusalanti laddhi,
atk-abh03a34:19_9: tesaṁ iṭṭhavipākaṭṭhena nibbānassa kusalatābhāvaṁ dīpetuṁ pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a34:22_2: Tattha yesaṁ “sakiṁ nimuggo nimuggova hotī”ti suttaṁ nissāya “atthi puthujjanassa accantaniyāmatā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a34:22_6: Mātughātakotiādi “niyatamicchādiṭṭhikassa ca mātughātakādīnañca samāne micchattaniyāme mātughātakādīhipi
atk-abh03a34:22_8: Itaro “niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko saṁsārakhāṇuko bhavantarepi niyatova ime pana ekasmiññeva attabhāve”ti laddhiyā na hevanti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a34:23_0: 848.Vicikicchā uppajjeyyāti “ayaṁ niyato vā no vā”ti evaṁ uppajjeyyāti pucchati.
atk-abh03a34:23_2: Nuppajjeyyāti puṭṭho pana yaṁ diṭṭhiṁ āsevanto niyāmaṁ okkanto,
atk-abh03a34:23_4: Tato pahīnāti puṭṭho maggena appahīnattā paṭikkhipati,
atk-abh03a34:23_6: Atha naṁ yasmā pahānaṁ nāma vinā ariyamaggena natthi,
atk-abh03a34:23_9: Puna katamenāti puṭṭho micchāmaggaṁ sandhāya akusalenātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a34:24_1: Itaro yasmā “yepi te okkalā vayabhiññā natthikavādā akiriyavādā ahetukavādā”ti vacanato tissopi niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyo ekassa uppajjanti,
atk-abh03a34:25_1: Atha naṁ “na ca nāma so accantaniyāmo”ti codetuṁ hañcītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a34:25_3: Nuppajjeyyāti pañhe yaṁ sassatadiṭṭhiyā sassatanti gahitaṁ,
atk-abh03a34:25_4: tadeva ucchijjissatīti gahetvā anuppattiṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a34:26_4: Imasmiññeva hi bhave abhabbo so taṁ diṭṭhiṁ pajahitunti ayamettha adhippāyo,
atk-abh03a34:26_6: Sabbakālaṁ ummujjitvā nimujjatītiādi vacanamatte abhinivesaṁ akatvā attho pariyesitabboti dassanatthaṁ vuttanti.
atk-abh03a34:29_2: Tattha lokiyā saddhā saddhā eva nāma,
atk-abh03a34:29_10: Natthi lokiyā saddhātiādi yasmā lokiyāpi saddhādayova dhammā adhipatiyaṭṭhena indriyaṁ,
atk-abh03a34:29_11: na saddhādīhi aññaṁ saddhindriyādi nāma atthi,
atk-abh03a34:29_13: Atthi lokiyo manotiādi yathā te lokiyāpi manādayo dhammā manindriyādīni,
atk-abh03a34:29_14: evaṁ lokiyā saddhādayopi saddhindriyānīti upamāya tassatthassa vibhāvanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
